Why might my antivirus software flag the Verus software as a virus or malware?

Some antivirus software, such as Avast and Kaspersky, may flag the Verus software as "not-a-virus" or "PUP" (potentially unwanted program). This is because Verus is a mining software, and some antivirus programs may warn users about installing mining software, as it could potentially be used by third parties to exploit their PC.
